p: Based on preliminary adulticidal screening results, the three most effective EOs were selected for adulticidal toxicity against C. megacephala, C. rufifacies and L. cuprina. The experiment was performed by topical application, with the procedure being the same as that in the preliminary screening of EOs. Each experiment was conducted in triplicate and fly mortality following treatment was checked after 24 h. The LD was calculated using Finneyâ€™s probit analysis [ 30].
